name: MechanicsDao

#02


‚õÖ Woop Woop! The clouds are out and I'm exploring the blockchain rabbit hole.


üå¥ Here's the DAO design I've been fiddling around with all day... The DAO is an exciting thing and I had a fine time reading all about it.


‚öîÔ∏è In one sentence, the DAO is a form of governance where everybody is an active participant and power is "equally" distributed. There's something called a token and once you have this token you can vote and pull your weight in the community.


ü•ß So many informational pies to consume, but sweet nonetheless. *phewww


‚ö° I'm Super Super excited to see you checking this out, Please Please leave feedback. I'd love to hear about ways to improve this.
